Headline: Temporary Westbound Reroute near Devon/Sacramento
ShortDescription: Westbound 155 Devon buses are temp. rerouted via Devon, California, Pratt, Kedzie, Devon, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near Devon/Sacramento.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #155 Devon buses are temporarily rerouted via Devon, California, Pratt, Kedzie, Devon, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near Devon/Sacramento.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Boarding Change, Delays at Howard
ShortDescription: Purple, Yellow and Red Line trains are still running with delays due to a track condition near the area of Howard. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Purple, Yellow and Red Line trains are still running with delays due to a track condition near the area of Howard.

As a result of the delay:

  • Riders are to board/exit Purple and Yellow Line trains on the platforms near track #2.
  • Riders are to board/exit Red Line trains on the platforms near tracks #3 and #4.

Also, consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines. These may include these bus routes:

  • #22 Clark
  • #147 Outer Drive Express 

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed near Cicero
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing due to police activity at Cicero. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing due to police activity at Cicero.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
